title: Escape from Bowden Institution  minimum security unit (Government of Canada)
text: ( Source : Government of Canada ) October 4, 2015 - Innisfail, Alberta - Correctional Service Canada On October 4, 2015 during the 11:45 a.m. count in the minimum security unit at Bowden Institution, staff members discovered that Kenton
